name: Knitting PATTERN Felted Doctor Bag Purse Satchel (PDF - digital delivery Only)
description:
Felted Doctor's Bag - KNITTING PATTERN - emailed PDF : 

PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

The pattern is for the BASIC SHAPE only. You decide what colors to use and other embellishments.

This one is great for all those beautiful buttons out there:)

The bag is designed to sit upright on its base. I hate it when my purse tips over:)

It is an advanced beginner level pattern...you will use strait needles for the entire project. Some simple seaming is required and I have written a full set of instructions with an illustration on how to get the most professional look possible. There is also a stitch guide provided. AND you can always contact me via email if you need any extra help:)

The main model in this listing was knit using random stripes and I just love the results. Each color was knit for 2 rows. I chose to make the side's stripes NOT match the front panels so that you could see how it is put together. It is very simple to make your stripes match up if you wish as shown in my denim blue and brown model.

The pattern provides you with easy to follow step by step instructions to create the basic shape. YOU WILL DECIDE ON what color(s) you want to work with and the extra embellishments (for example: stripe details and buttons).

You will use size 10.5 needles and 650 yards of worsted weight wool.

The U- shaped handles are easy online,  ebay and at most craft stores:)

BEAUTIFUL !

Measures about:

7"h (not including the handles) x 11.5"w x 5"d

If we MUST use the regular mail, the pattern will have black and white pictures. (I can email a color picture for you to print. You need only to ask!!! You can also refer to my listing for color pictures.)This is a digital item in PDF and will be sent to your email within 24 hours of purchase...THANKS!

Along with my self published. I have designs and tips in several publications including the book "100 Purses to Knit and Crochet", the upcoming 2008 Pattern a Day calendar (Jan 23rd) and in Nicky Epstein's upcoming book, "Knitting Never Felt Better" and Interweave's Felt 2008 issue.

name: Pyramid Tote - Upgraded - A Felted Knitting Pattern - PDF, digital delivery only
description:
PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

Pyramid Tote - Upgraded Edition
by Jennifer Pace, Pipp's Purses

Published - July 2010

Yarn weight Worsted

Gauge - 12 stitches and 18 rows = 4 inches in stockinette
Needle size - US 10½ - 6.5 mm
Yardage - 800 - 0 yards (732 - 0 m)
Size - approximately 11 1/2" wide x 7" high 4" deep a the base

PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

The Striped Pyramid Tote was originally published in Interweave’s Special Edition Magazine: FELT 2008. The rights to sell have since been returned to me & I am thrilled to offer you this ‘upgraded’ version. HAPPY KNITTING!!

My Upgrades Include:
9 color pages of detailed, step by step instructions
Stitch guide
Common abbreviation legend
Shopping List
Technique Illustrations
Instructions for adding a side pocket
Design Notes and tips (times saving, shaping)
Multiple photos to help guide you along
Pattern Support via email
Entirely new segment devoted to embellishing your tote with 3-dimensional funky flowers, leaves and vines.


PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

name: Knitting PATTERN - Convertibles - finglerless mitt pattern with a folding top in PDF
description:
PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours. Fine for both PC and MACs.

NOTE: pattern's model photo shows 2 options: no top at all and top down.

Yarn weight -
Sport or DK

Needle size -
US 3 - 3.25 mm
US 4 - 3.5 mm

Yardage -
150 - 180 yards (137 - 165 m)

Sizes -
average adult BUT easily adjustable. Design notes on how to increase/decrease size included. Design notes also include ways to lengthen the cuff.

The convertible top is optional. As is the ability to add a cute little button to hold the top down.

7 page pattern includes:

* Step by step/ row by row instructions
* Multiple color photos and illustrations
* Stitch guide
* Shopping list
* Design notes and tips
* pattern support from the designer via email or
Ravelry (I'm Pipp) messaging

name: NEW design - Knitting PATTERN - NICE HOOTERS - PDF pattern digital delivery - Toy or Pillow
description:
PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

A whimsical pattern… just for fun.
Soft and cuddly.
Big enough to be a throw pillow OR a little one’s best friend.
Removable wings to encourage little fingers to practice tying bows and knots. Skip the wings and add a ribbon, scarf or bow tie:)

** 9 pages of instructions include:**
* Step by step/ row by row instructions
* Multiple color photos and illustrations
* Stitch guide
* Shopping list
* Design notes, optional embellishment ideas and tips
* pattern support from the designer via Ravelry messaging

Dimensions: (approximate)
15 inches tall
8.5 inches wide
7 inches deep

Many thanks go out to STITCHTWISTER of Ravelry for all of her help in making the instructions more accessible:) THANK YOU LYNN!!

Craft-Knitting
Type- Toy - Pillow
Published- February 2010
Yarns suggested- sport weight to light DK
Gauge- 22 stitches & 33 rows = 4" in stockinette stitch
Needle size US 4 / 3.5 mm for the body
US 5 / 3.75 mm for the wings
Yardage - 270 - 300 yards (247 - 274 m)
Approximately 180 for the body & 90 for the wings

PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

name: Knitting pattern Felted Basket (PDF - digital delivery ONLY)
description:
Felted Basket / Bucket

by Pipp's Purses

Do you have enough felted purses???

But cannot stop felting???

Here is an idea!

This pattern will provide you with the basic basket pattern! You get to decide what colors you want to use....

Enjoy my latest felting pattern! Completely original/of a kind copyrighted design form Pipp's Purses!I will soon have one of my original felting patterns featured in a nationally distributed knitting and crochet handbag book which will be available in the famous bookstores we all know and love!

PDF is emailed to you after payment has been received within 24 hours.

The pattern is for the BASIC SHAPE only. You decide what colors to use and other embellishments.

We all need to be more organized. No need to ordinary. Everyone needs more places to put their knitting stashes and magazines!

Knit with 100% new wool (worsted weight) that is hand knit and then washed in to a rich felted material!!

NOTE:The straps that are in the pictures for this listing are from an old boring basket from the neighborhood superstore. I have included detailed instructions for knitting straps for this basket.

People will not know that it is hand knit because I use 10.5 needles and fine wools.

The bag measures: approximately 7-8"h x 30" in circumference/11-12" diameter.

If we MUST use the regular mail, the pattern will have black and white pictures. (I can email a color picture for you to print. You need only to ask!!! You can also refer to my listing for color pictures.)This is a digital item in PDF and will be sent to your email within 24 hours of purchase...THANKS!
